column1: 現在、市場の給与相場について調査を続けているため、特定の給与水準は決まっていません。しかし、もし幸運にもオファーをいただければ、その際に報酬や福利厚生、その他の詳細について話し合うことを楽しみにしています。最終的には、役職や企業文化に見合った公平な給与パッケージを求めています。
column2: Genzai, shijō no kyūyo sōba ni tsuite chōsa o tsuzukete iru tame, tokutei no kyūyo suijun wa kimatteimasen. Shikashi, moshi kōun ni mo ofā o itadakereba, sono sai ni hōshū ya fukuri kōsei, sono ta no shōsai ni tsuite hanashiau koto o tanoshimi ni shiteimasu. Saishū-teki ni wa, yakushoku ya kigyō bunka ni miaatta kōhei na kyūyo pakkēji o motometeimasu.
column3: Currently, I am still researching market rates, so I have not settled on a specific salary expectation. However, should I be fortunate enough to receive an offer, I would be happy to discuss compensation, including benefits and other details, at that time. Ultimately, I am looking for a compensation package that is fair and in line with both the role and company culture.

column1: 私の主な趣味の一つはカリステニクスです。デスクワークのような仕事では、運動をおろそかにしがちだと気づき、健康を保ち、アクティブでいることを大切にしたいと思いました。カリステニクスは、ジムや器具を必要とせず、どこでも、いつでもできるため、私にぴったりです。自宅、公園、あるいは仕事の休憩中にも行えます。それは体を健康に保つだけでなく、自信や精神的な明晰さも高め、技術の複雑な問題に取り組む際に必要不可欠です。
column2: Watashi no omona shumi no hitotsu wa karisutenikusu desu. Desukuwāku no yōna shigoto de wa, undō o orosoka ni shigachi da to kizuki, kenkō o tamotsu, akutibu de iru koto o taisetsu ni shitai to omoimashita. Karisutenikusu wa, jimū ya kigu o hitsuyō to sezu, doko demo, itsudemo dekiru tame, watashi ni pittari desu. Jitaku, kōen, arui wa shigoto no kyūkei-chū ni mo okonemasu. Sore wa karada o kenkō ni tamotsu dake de naku, jishin ya seishinteki na meiseikusa mo takame, gijutsu no fukuzatsu na mondai ni torikumu sai ni hitsuyō fukaketsu desu.
column3: One of my main hobbies is calisthenics. I’ve realized that in a desk job like mine, it’s easy to neglect physical activity, and I wanted to make sure I stay healthy and active. Calisthenics is perfect for me because it doesn’t require a gym or equipment, and I can do it anytime, anywhere—at home, in the park, or even during a break at work. It not only helps me stay physically fit but also boosts my confidence and mental clarity, which are essential when working on complex problems in tech.

column1: さらに、私は学習と自己改善に強い関心を持っています。これは Rust のような新しい技術、ソフトウェア、プログラミング言語を探求する趣味にも広がっています。これにより、常に自己成長を促進し、個人的にも職業的にも成長を続けることができます。
column2: Sarani, watashi wa gakushū to jiko kaizen ni tsuyoi kanshin o motteimasu. Kore wa Rust no yōna atarashī gijutsu, sofutowea, puroguramingu gengo o tankyū suru shumi ni mo hirogattemasu. Kore ni yori, tsuneni jiko seichō o sokushin shi, kojinteki ni mo shokugyōteki ni mo seichō o tsuzukeru koto ga dekimasu.
column3: Additionally, I have a strong interest in learning and self-improvement. This extends to my hobby of exploring new technologies, software, and programming languages like Rust. It keeps me constantly engaged and ensures I am always growing both personally and professionally.
